article_title: Clothier Scuba Steve is back in clothes himself, after cancer treatment
article_text: GULFPORT -- For the first time in a long time, "Scuba Steve" Johnson was able to put on clothes without pain. The blisters on his hands and feet have healed, but he still wears his Kanye West sneakers for support rather than his usual flip-flops or Chaco sandals.

article_summary:
GULFPORT -- For the first time in a long time, "Scuba Steve" Johnson was able to put on clothes without pain.
The blisters on his hands and feet have healed, but he still wears his Kanye West sneakers for support rather than his usual flip-flops or Chaco sandals.
